Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IRoom, Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Northgate Avenue, N. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand at the north end of the wide Northgate Avenue. North is a darkness where the north gates should be. To the west a sign indicates a tailor shop. East is a blank wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Tailor Shop

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have stepped through the door of a tiny tailor shop. One side has shelves stacked with colorful bolts of cloth. A large work table and a chest of drawers takes up much of the rest of the room. A hand-lettered sign is atop the chest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Northgate Avenue

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand nearly alone; the street is all but deserted. There is a bakery to your west. A narrow lane goes east, and is marked by a sign affixed to the wall on one side: "Sheep Alley".

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a busy bakery shop. To one side is a sturdy table for working the dough. A stack of flour sacks rests against the opposite wall. An immense fireplace commands the rear wall, with large ovens built into either side of the hearth.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Northgate Avenue

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stride along Northgate Avenue. To the east stands a glassblower's shop. Another broad paved lane runs west. You see by the sign that the lane is named "Wolf Street".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Glassblower's Shop

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a glassblower's shop. A window shelf displays fanciful glass pieces. Other shelves are heavy with common glassware: jars, vases, and dishware. Plate glass leans against a back wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Northgate Avenue, S. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the south end of Northgate Avenue. The main square is south, and the wide avenue runs northwards to end in blank darkness. Here is a silversmith to the west, and advice can be had from an astrologer to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Silversmith's Shop

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here is a tiny shop with an iron-bound oak door and thick iron bars on the one window. A heavy iron cabinet, its thick door ajar, is in the rear. In the middle of the room, the smith's workbench faces you, flanked by a small brazier.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: House Of Astrology

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here is a bare room, the walls covered in symbols that represent configurations of the planets and stars. A small table is centered on the otherwise bare floor, and is buried in charts and diagrams.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: N. Main Square

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand at the north end of the great common ground of the city. To the north stretches Northgate Avenue, and a large building stands to your west. The sign over the building's double doors says "Meeting Hall".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Meeting Hall

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here is a great high-ceilinged hall with long benches in a double row that face a low podium. There is no one here now.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Main Square

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand at the center of the city main square. As you turn in a circle, you can see down the length of the four gate avenues that lead in all directions to end in blackness at the city walls.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: S. Main Square

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are now in the southern portion of the main square. Southgate Avenue leads away towards the city's south gate, and there is a busy pub to your west. The sign over the pub reads: "The Prancing Unicorn".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Prancing Unicorn

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a busy public house. Here is a large number of citizens; most are engaged in drowning the anxieties stemming from being trapped in a doomed city. None notice you in their anguish.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Southgate Avenue, N. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the north end of Southgate Avenue. The main square is north, and the avenue extends away southward. You detect the evident scents of a brewery emanating from an unmarked door to your west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here is a large room with heavily beamed ceiling. Ranged in a double row along both walls are great casks, and set in the center of the floor are two great vats being tended by a burly brewer.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Southgate Avenue, Intersection

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here is a four-way intersection of wide Southgate Avenue, which extends north and south. A small brass plaque proclaims the east way to be the "Temple Passage". The west way is only a space between the brewery and a courtyard wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Southgate Avenue

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are striding along Southgate Avenue. There is a tall stone courtyard wall to the west and a blank wall of a building to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Southgate Avenue

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have come to the entrance into the courtyard to your west. There is only a blank wall to the east. The wide avenue extends north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Southgate Avenue, S. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached the end of Southgate Avenue. Before you to the south is a black nothingness where the gates should be. There is no exit to east or west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the courtyard of a great house. The courtyard runs around to the north and south sides of the house. Before you to the west, a great bronze double door awaits atop nine broad stone steps.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have walked around behind the house. Here is a well-tended herb garden, but curiously, there is no rear door to the house.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the foyer of the house. There is no door in the dark paneled walls. A familiar looking magician's hat hangs from a wall hook here; it is dark blue and covered with mystic symbols, and is quite battered. Exits are east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Waiting Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a medium-sized room. It too is darkly paneled, and a thick red carpet rests upon the floor. There is an upholstered bench backed against the north wall. A narrow staircase goes up in the south wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Magician's Parlor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have ascended into the customers' service parlor of the house magician. Incense braziers in every corner of the room exude a thick, aromatic smoke that coalesces into a canopy overhead. The stair down is in the south wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Alley Between Two Walls

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a narrow alley between a courtyard wall and a brick building. A dirt path here is well worn from many years of use.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Westgate Avenue, E. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the eastern end of the broad Westgate Avenue. To your east lies the main square. The avenue extends off to the west. There are blank brick walls to the north and south here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Westgate Avenue, Intersection

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached an intersection on the Westgate Avenue, which extends east and west. A plaque to the north names the narrow way there "Dog Alley", while a similar plaque south names "Ox Avenue".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Westgate Avenue, W. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached the end of Westgate Avenue. There is a black nothingness where the west gates should be. A heavy stone wall is north. On the south side, a weathered sign mounted above an open doorway names the city stables.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: City Stables

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here is the city stables. Many of the stalls are empty, though several tired looking horses and a donkey or two are kept here. A crude sign affixed to a post says "Help Wanted".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Ox Avenue, N. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the northern end of Ox Avenue where it runs into a broad street to the north. There is a brick wall east, and a rough wooden wall west. The avenue continues to the south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Ox Avenue/Rat Alley, Intersection

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have come to an intersection. The Ox Avenue reaches away north and south, and a narrow alleyway runs west. The plaque says "Rat Alley". There is a blank brick wall east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Rat Alley

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a rough alley that intersects with a broad avenue to the east. There is a rough wooden wall north. A large, dirty, open-air shop is to the south. The sign says "Blacksmith".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Blacksmith Shop

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a large open-air shop. The center of the room is dominated by a forge and bellows, and a huge steel anvil. There are piles of scrap iron and unfinished work lying about on the dirt floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Rat Alley, W. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here the alley dead-ends into the outer wall of the city. A rough wooden wall lies north, and a shop south. The sign over the shop says in large bold letters "Leather Work", and underneath "Saddles - Harness For Beast Or Armor - Shoes".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Leather Shop

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a small leather-working shop. The smells of fresh leather are very pleasant. Hung from hooks on the walls are such things as horse bridles and the heavy leather straps that are used as shield handles.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Ox Avenue

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are not far from the southern end of Ox Avenue. To the west is a blank wall, but there is a narrow alley between two walls to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Ox Avenue, S. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand at an L-intersection. Wide Ox Avenue runs northwards, but dead-ends into a wall south. A narrow lane goes west from here, and a small wooden sign names the lane: "Rabbit Alley".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Rabbit Alley

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the east end of short Rabbit Alley. To the north is a potter's shop. A decrepit looking apothecary shop lies south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Potter's Shop

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the pottery shop. All around you are tall stacks of pottery that seem quite precariously balanced. It takes careful attention to move among them without mishap.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the apothecary. The shop appears to attract little business from the townsmen, as the rows of vials and pots are quite dusty.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Rabbit Alley, W. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached the west end of Rabbit Alley. To the west is the heavy stone wall of the city. North is a carpenter's shop. To the south is a shop that you have been all too familiar with in your past; it has 3 balls over the doorway.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Carpenter's Shop

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the carpenter's shop. A selection of furniture is on display at the front of the shop. The long work bench is towards the rear, against one side wall, and fresh-sawn wood is piled against the opposite wall.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the pawnshop. All about you is the usual junk that one always finds in such an establishment: musical instruments, jewelry, weapons, tools, fine cabinets, etc.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wolf Street

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand near the eastern end of Wolf Street. North is a tall stone wall with a thick, iron-bound gate that is barred from within. A plaque on the wall reads "Duke Lambert". There is the blank wall of a building south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wolf Street/Dog Alley, Intersection

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached a T-intersection. To east and west runs Wolf Street. There is a building wall north. A narrow lane named Dog Alley lies south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: NW Residential Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a small residential neighborhood. You are extremely unlikely to find anything that would further your quest among the dwellings here. Wolf Street lies east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: NE Residential Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a large residential neighborhood in the commoner section of the city. You are extremely unlikely to find anything among the hovels here that could further your quest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: NE Residential Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a large residential neighborhood in the commoner section of the city. You are extremely unlikely to find anything among the hovels here that could further your quest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Eastgate Avenue, W. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the western end of Eastgate Avenue. The main square lies west, and the avenue extends eastward. A building wall built from large, well-dressed stones lies south. The commoner's city quarter lies to the north.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Eastgate Avenue

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand near the middle of Eastgate Avenue. A poorly-laid brick wall lies north. To the south is the wide, well paved, Avenue of Temples.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Eastgate Avenue, E. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached the eastern end of Eastgate Avenue. A black nothingness exists where the east gates should be. The commoner's city quarter lies to the north.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Avenue Of Temples, N. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the north end of the Avenue of Temples, which continues south. North is the intersection with Eastgate Avenue. To the west is a low temple of brown stone. East is a steepled temple built from bright, orange-red brick.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Avenue Of Temples

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand in the Avenue of Temples. The pavement cobblestones are well-set and in good repair. West is a gray temple with a single yellow spire. And east is a temple that is constructed from bricks of translucent, greenish glass.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Lanes, Intersection

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have come upon an intersection of two lanes. North and south is the Avenue of Temples. Temple passage, an equally wide and well-paved lane, runs west. A temple of clear glass bricks lies east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Avenue Of Temples

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are approaching the southern end of the Avenue of Temples. West is a great blue temple, almost a cathedral, that has been severely damaged, perhaps by repeated lightning strikes. East is a narrow temple of the blackest stone.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Avenue Of Temples, S. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached the southern end of the avenue, and face the stone city wall to the south. West is a temple constructed of smooth red brick. East is a temple built from stone that has a violet cast to it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Passage, E. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a north/south lane to your east; this lane continues west. North is a heavy, gray stone temple, graced by a single yellow spire. And south is a very large temple that has been nearly destroyed, as if by repeated bolts of lightning.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of Sylicat

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand in the Temple of Sylicat, the earth god. The walls and furnishings are various shades of brown and tan. The low kneeling benches are bisected by a single aisle that dead-ends against the rear wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of Salam

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the Temple of Salam, the god of fire. There are several low prayer-benches along the side walls. The temple is illuminated by two braziers that stand in opposite corners.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of Meteor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the Temple of Meteor, the weather-god. This temple is large and thickly furnished with many prayer benches for use by the many farmers who come to visit from the surrounding lands outside the city walls.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of H'oh

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the Temple of H'oh, the god of water. The low prayer benches are made from the same clear green glass as the temple itself, but adorned with soft white knee pads.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of Gyx

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the Temple of Gyx, god of the air. Though the temple is closed and unventilated, you feel a breeze on your cheek, and the air you breathe is fresh and clean-smelling.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of The Nameless

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the temple of the nameless, god of darkness. The temple is unlit, and wrapped in shadow. The nameless is given a temple to appease his wrath, but unnamed lest he be summoned. You sense a dreadful presence near at hand.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of Fisic

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the Temple of Fisic, guardian of well-being and healer of the sick. The low prayer benches and wall curtains are colored the deepest violet. Though the side walls are curtained, the rear wall is bare.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of Dis

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the Temple of Dis the destroyer, god of death and destruction. Save for the blood-red prayer benches, the temple is bare and unadorned, and has a most depressing demeanor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of Lumen

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the Temple of Lumen, lord of light, patron god of the city. The roof has fallen in, and everywhere are burns and scorch marks. Only the west wall and a fragment of stone seem undamaged. The place feels untenanted.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Passage, W. End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in Temple Passage, off the main square. A beautiful white stone temple is north. The ruin of an enormous blue temple stands south, still majestic even in decay. A mural graces the wall here; the entrance is further east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Of Bo

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the Temple of Bo, goddess of beauty. Everything, even the floor, is of the purest white. The prayer benches are a wonder to behold, so well-shaped are they in their careful carving.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Tokas' Sanctum

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a magician's working sanctum! The walls are indistinct in a haze of smoke. The only furnishings are colored smoke "cushions" that litter the smoke "floor", through which you can see the parlor below.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Dog Alley

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking down a short alley. The east side of the alley is bordered by a tall, blank, brick wall. A stoutly built stone building is to the west, with a heavy oaken door, and slit-like windows with single heavy shutters.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the city armory. You stand in a tiny anteroom. A heavy iron grillwork blocks the door west into the armory proper. Through the door you can see rack upon rack of swords, spears, and crossbows.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Gigantic Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself in a room of gigantic proportions; the walls and ceiling are indistinct in the distance. Wandering about, you can find no sign of a door or window in the floor or walls.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Violet Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself at the west end of a short violet hallway. Behind you, to the west, a translucent wall glows a deep violet color, dimly illuminating the hallway. To the east is darkness.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Dark Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a chamber in which the walls glow in a violet so deep as to be black to ordinary eyes. You can discern no exit other than the one by which you entered.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Rock Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself in a low tunnel hewn from brown rock. South, to your rear is a smooth translucent wall, glowing with a light tan color. There is a blind corner ahead. There is a sharp odor in the air that stands your hair on end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Blind Corner

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at a blind corner bending west and south. The odor is stronger here; you sniff a strong, supernatural taint that screams, "Danger!" You cannot see around the corner yet.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have rounded the corner. The tunnel extends a goodly distance further to the west.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are midway down the length of the tunnel. The rock of the walls appears rough-hewn but shows no evidence of tool marks. The odor is overpowering here. There is a shimmering curtain of air to your west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Tunnel, End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached the end of the tunnel. A tiny niche is recessed into the other-wise blank west wall that terminates the tunnel's farthest reach. There is a shimmering curtain of air to the east.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself on a very narrow ledge by a west wall that glows translucent orange. Steps descend from the ledge into a sea of fire. You see a glittering creature standing upon a pedestal that rises from the flames, out of reach.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Vault Of Fire, Above

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: As you stride boldly across the room, thunder crashes from the air under your feet at each step and echoes around the vaulted room! The din slaps the flames about as they lick at your boot soles.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Vault Of Fire, Inside

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand amid the flames of Salam! The flames burn you! To your east is the base of a tall pedestal that rises far out of the fires.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Cathedral, Outside

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself on a wide avenue, floored with purest white marble, and bordered by tall white walls to east and west. Behind you, to the north, a blank wall glows in a translucent cyan color. A grand cathedral lies south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Outer Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered the cathedral, and now stand in a low, wide outer chamber. You face twin great bronze doors of enormous breadth and thickness; they stand open before you.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand in the nave of a tremendous, vaulted cathedral. Thousands of prayer benches line both sides of the aisle in which you stand. The vaulted ceiling is so distantly high that local storms seem a distinct possibility.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the chancel of the cathedral. Before you on a high dais is a fabulous altar wrought from gold and silver.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Altar Dais

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have climbed the steps of the dais. A fabulous altar of gold and silver, and capped by a fantastic carved ebony slab stands before you. A reliquary rests on the exact center of the altar top.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself atop an impossibly high pinnacle of yellow rock. The spire is bordered by a low wall that glows a translucent yellow, and is topped by an odd looking, low yellow rail. The wind gusts dangerously!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself on a narrow beach at the foot of a glowing translucent green wall. You face a heavy sea, and breakers crash with heavy blows. You know that you could never survive a swim east into those waters.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Sea, Above

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Thunder crashes from the air under your feet as you stride above the water, and soon enough you reach a steep, pointed spire of green rock. A single black shadow mars its uniform surface.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: White Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself in a cubical white room with glowing white floor, walls, and ceiling. A graceful pedestal rests in the exact center of the room, that glows the same gentle white.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Glowing Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself in a room with four glowing walls of different colors. There are no visible exits, but each wall has an empty niche set into it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Tiny Blue Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself in a tiny blue room. Its few furnishings put you in mind of a small blacksmith's shop.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You find yourself on a narrow ledge, at the brink of a black, bottomless abyss. Far to the east you can possibly glimpse the far side of the chasm.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Far Cliff

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached the far side of the abyss. The walls north and south rapidly narrow, and meet at a great door to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Throne Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a vast black emptiness. Far in the distance, and yet at the same instant close enough to touch, is a great black throne.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e]], System.Private.CoreLib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e
